TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessagePropertyFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制并选择从消息队列查看或接收消息时检索的属性。

span.span: Controls and selects the properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving messages from a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置上实例控制扫视或接收消息时检索的属性集。Setting the on a instance controls the set of properties that are retrieved when peeking or receiving a message. 实例上设置的筛选器检索的消息信息。The filter is set on the instance of that retrieves the message information. 当您将设置布尔值成员添加到`false`，阻止关联的信息属性从由检索。When you set a Boolean-valued member to `false`, you prevent the information of the associated property from being retrieved by the . 有几个不是布尔值的筛选器属性。There are several filter properties that are not Boolean values. 它们是用于获取或设置的默认大小的整数值， ，或。They are integer values that get or set the default sizes of the , , or . 检索一组有限的属性可帮助提高性能，因为较少的数据传输队列中。Retrieving a limited set of properties helps improve performance because smaller amounts of data are transferred from the queue. 在设置属性时，只指示在接收或查看消息时是否检索该属性。When setting a property on , you are only indicating whether that property is retrieved when a message is received or peeked. 您未更改的关联的属性值。You are not changing the associated property value for the . 构造函数将所有筛选器属性设置为其默认值，即布尔值的`false`。The constructor sets all filter properties to their default values, which for the Boolean values is `false`. 请参阅分配给的整数值的属性的默认值的构造函数主题。See the constructor topic for the defaults assigned to the integer-valued properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同的优先级的消息发送到队列，并随后对其进行检索。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并为所有属性设置默认值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets default values for all properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将所有布尔值设置为`false`和将整数值的属性设置为下表中显示的默认值。The constructor sets all Boolean values to `false` and sets the integer-valued properties to the default values shown in the following table. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10241024| ||255255| ||255255| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcknowledgeType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AcknowledgeType : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定发送应用程序请求的确认消息的类型。The property of the class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application. 确认该类型定义时返回确认。The type of acknowledgment defines when acknowledgments are returned. 设置发送消息以请求特定类型的确认之前的属性。Set the property before sending the message to request a specific type of acknowledgment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Acknowledgment { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Acknowledgment : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定类型的确认消息中的管理队列，用于确定何时生成确认系统执行 post。The property of the class specifies the type of acknowledgment messages the system posts in the administration queue, which determines when acknowledgments are generated. 确认返回从目标队列，并将其作为消息传递到指定原始消息。Acknowledgments are returned from the destination queue and posted as messages to the specified by the original message. 生成的确认类型取决于请求的内容。The type of acknowledgment generated depends on what was requested. 读取接收来自管理队列以验证消息最初发送到消息队列的状态消息时的属性。Read the property when receiving a message from an administration queue to verify the status of the message originally sent to the message queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单到和从队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它专门请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指示当消息到达目标队列。The property of the class indicates when the message arrived at the destination queue. 这是计算机的本地时间，从格林威治标准时间，在其检索到消息的调整。This is local time, adjusted from GMT, of the computer on which the message is retrieved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#4)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的属性类指定是否应为或已附加到邮件。The property of the class specifies whether the should be or has been attached to the message. 由消息队列设置，用于通过接收队列管理器验证发件人是否具有对队列的访问权限。The is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#5)]

member this.Authenticated : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类由接收应用程序用来确定是否已请求身份验证。The property of the class is used by the receiving application to determine if authentication was requested. 如果已请求身份验证并且消息在队列中，该消息进行身份验证。If authentication was requested and the message is in the queue, then the message is authenticated. 不能查看的消息属性，并确定消息是否未通过身份验证。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 身份验证失败的消息将被放弃且不会传递到队列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#6)]

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定用于生成消息数字签名的加密提供程序的名称。The property of the class specifies the name of the cryptographic provider used to generate the digital signature of the message. 通常使用外部队列时使用。 is typically used when working with foreign queues. 其他 Microsoft 消息队列队列系统中存在外队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列与连接器应用程序通过此类队列进行通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#7)]

Microsoft 消息队列与连接器应用程序通过此类队列进行通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 将所有布尔型筛选器的值设置为 ，以便在接收消息时不检索消息属性。

span.span: Sets all Boolean filter values to , so that no message properties are retrieved when receiving a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要设置所有到布尔属性`false`。Use to set all Boolean properties to `false`. 这将导致在接收消息时要检索任何消息属性。This causes no message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages. 不会影响的值， ，或。 does not affect the values for , , or . 在调用，必须将至少一个筛选器属性设置为`true`为了接收与消息相关的数据。After calling , it is necessary to set at least one filter property to `true` in order to receive data related to a message. 你可以将个别属性设置为`true`，也可以调用或。You can either set individual properties to `true`, or you can call or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类时是必需的应用程序设置通常由消息队列设置消息属性。The property of the class is required when an application sets a message property that is typically set by Message Queuing. 使用以下两个实例中：It is used in the following two instances: - 连接器应用程序，通过传递消息时才可进行发送和接收应用程序能够解释的消息的安全和确认属性。When a message is passed by a connector application, the is required for the sending and receiving applications to interpret the security and acknowledgment properties of the message. - 发送应用程序加密消息时属性会通知消息队列使用对称密钥。When sending application-encrypted messages, the property informs Message Queuing to use the symmetric key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#10)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定确认和报告消息用以引用原始消息的消息标识符。The property of the class specifies a message identifier that is used by acknowledgment and report messages to reference the original message. 它提供了接收应用程序可用于对消息进行排序的应用程序定义的标识符。It provides an application-defined identifier that the receiving application can use to sort messages. ## Examples 下面的代码示例发送和接收包含订单到和从队列的消息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它专门请求肯定确认当原始消息到达或已从队列中检索。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置默认主体缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the default body buffer.

value.span: 接收消息时创建的默认主体缓冲区大小。

span.span: The default body buffer size to create when the message is received.

value.span: 默认值为 1024 个字节。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认主体大小指定要为消息的正文内容分配字节的数。The default body size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's body contents. 属性的类表示消息的序列化的内容。The property of the class represents the serialized contents of the message. 正文可以包含最多 4 MB 的数据。The body can contain up to 4 MB of data. 限制正文大小可以提高性能。Restricting the body size can improve performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认扩展大小指定要为消息的扩展插件分配字节的数。The default extension size specifies the number of bytes to allocate for the message's extension. 属性的类表示与该消息，例如二进制大型对象关联的、 应用程序定义的附加信息。The property of the class represents the additional, application-defined information associated with the message, such as a binary large object. 要解释的内容的应用程序负责。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the contents of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类标识原始消息的目标队列。The property of the class identifies the original destination queue of the message. 它通常用于确定在日志或死信队列的消息的原始目标。It is typically used to determine the original destination of a message that is in a journal or dead-letter queue. 它还使用时将响应消息发送回响应队列。It can also be used when sending a response message back to a response queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定用于对消息进行加密的对称密钥。The property of the class specifies the symmetric key used to encrypt the message. 发送应用程序加密的消息，或向外队列发送加密的消息时，它是必需。It is required when you send application-encrypted messages, or when you send encrypted messages to a foreign queue. 其他 Microsoft 消息队列队列系统中存在外队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列与连接器应用程序通过此类队列进行通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定用于对消息进行身份验证的数字签名。The property of the class specifies the digital signature used to authenticate the message. 在大多数情况下，它是生成的发送应用程序请求身份验证时，由消息队列设置。In most cases, it is generated and set by Message Queuing when the sending application requests authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类标识消息类型。The property of the class identifies the type of the message. 一条消息可以是普通消息、 肯定或否定确认消息或报告消息。A message can be a normal message, a positive or negative acknowledgment message, or a report message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#22)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类会影响时途中，消息队列处理消息的方式，以及在到达其目标时，将该消息放在队列中。The property of the class affects how Message Queuing handles the message while it is en route, as well as where the message is placed in the queue when it reaches its destination. 仅可以为非事务性消息有意义的方式设置消息优先级。Message priority can only be set meaningfully for non-transactional messages. 事务性消息的优先级自动设置为零，这会导致事务性消息优先级被忽略。The priority for transactional messages is automatically set to zero, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个不同的优先级的消息发送到队列，并随后对其进行检索。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Recoverable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Recoverable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指示是否保证消息的传递，即使消息传递到目标队列的过程中出现计算机故障。The property of the class indicates whether delivery of a message is guaranteed, even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果保证消息的传递，该消息是本地存储每个步骤直到消息已成功转发到下一台计算机。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 设置到`true`消息可能会影响吞吐量。Setting to `true` on the message could affect the throughput. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#23)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类标识接收发回给接收应用程序发送的应用程序的应用程序生成的响应消息的队列。The property of the class identifies the queue that receives application-generated response messages that are sent back to the sending application by the receiving application. 当应用程序发送其消息时由发送应用程序指定响应队列。Response queues are specified by the sending application when the application sends its messages. 任何可用队列均可指定为响应队列。Any available queue can be specified as a response queue. 返回到响应队列的消息是应用程序特定的。Messages returned to the response queue are application-specific. 应用程序必须定义什么是消息中以及什么是收到一条消息时执行的操作。The application must define what is in the messages as well as what is to be done when a message is received. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#24](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#24)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#24)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类主要由接收队列管理器进行身份验证一条消息时使用。The property of the class is used primarily by the receiving queue manager when authenticating a message. 该属性由消息队列设置，队列管理器用于验证消息发件人和发件人已对接收队列的访问权限。The property is set by Message Queuing and is used by the queue manager to verify who sent the message and that the sender has access rights to the receiving queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#26)]

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定的消息队列用于发送消息的版本。The property of the class specifies the version of Message Queuing used to send the message. 务必使用事务处理，仅支持由消息队列 2.0 版和更高版本，或数字签名，将用它们来进行身份验证由 1.0 版发送的消息等功能时应注意的是属性。The property is important to be aware of when using features like transaction processing, which is only supported by Message Queuing version 2.0 and later, or digital signatures, which are used to authenticate messages sent by version 1.0. 由发送队列管理器发送消息时设置。 is set by the sending queue manager when the message is sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指示发送计算机的日期和时间时由源队列管理器发送消息。The property of the class indicates the sending machine's date and time when the message was sent by the source Queue Manager. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 指定在接收消息时检索消息的所有属性。

span.span: Specifies to retrieve all message properties when receiving a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要设置所有布尔属性设置为`true`。Use to set all Boolean properties to `true`. 这将导致在接收消息时要检索的所有消息属性。This causes all message properties to be retrieved when receiving messages. 不会影响的值， ，或。 does not affect the values for , , or . 在调用，可以将各个筛选器值设置为`false`以限制在接收消息时检索的属性。After calling , you can set individual filter values to `false` in order to restrict the properties retrieved when the message is received. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以设置以下布尔值属性设置为`true`。Use to set the following Boolean-valued properties to `true`. 这些是最常见属性通常将与以下进行交互：These are the most common properties a will typically interact with the following: - - - - - - - - - - - 下表为其默认值中设置的属性。 sets the properties in the following table to their default values. |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||10241024| ||255255| ||255255| 属性表示在其上已调用。The property represents a on which has been called. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法。The following code example calls the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定作为消息起源的计算机。The property of the class specifies the computer where the message originated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定在数秒内发送的消息从目标队列接收的总时间。The property of the class specifies the total time in seconds for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 要从目标队列中检索的消息的时间限制包括到达目标队列所用的时间加上所花费的时间在队列中的等待消息检索由应用程序之前。The time limit for the message to be retrieved from the target queue includes the time spent getting to the destination queue, plus the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is retrieved by an application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#30)]

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定时间限制从为其到达目标队列发送消息的时间 （秒）。The property of the class specifies a time limit in seconds from the time the message is sent for it to reach the destination queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#31)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类标识发送消息的事务。The property of the class identifies the transaction that sent the message. 使用此属性接收应用程序中的验证消息已发送特定事务的一部分。Use this property within a receiving application to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#52](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#52)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#52](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#52)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TransactionStatusQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.TransactionStatusQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类标识源计算机上的事务状态队列。The property of the class identifies the transaction status queue on the source computer. 该属性用于将确认消息发送回发送应用程序。The property is used for sending acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 连接器应用程序接收发送到外部队列的事务性消息时使用的事务状态队列。The transaction status queue is used by connector applications when receiving transactional messages sent to a foreign queue. 其他 Microsoft 消息队列队列系统中存在外队列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. Microsoft 消息队列与连接器应用程序通过此类队列进行通信。Microsoft Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#53](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#53)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#53](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#53)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAuthentication { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseAuthentication : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定消息是否需要进行身份验证。The property of the class specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 不能查看的消息属性，并确定消息是否未通过身份验证。It is not possible to look at the properties of a message and determine whether a message failed authentication. 身份验证失败的消息将被放弃且不会传递到队列。Messages that fail authentication are discarded and are not delivered to the queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#32)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定是否应将无法传递消息的副本发送到死信队列。The property of the class specifies whether a copy of a message that could not be delivered should be sent to a dead-letter queue. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定是否应在始发计算机的计算机日记中保留消息的副本。The property of the class specifies whether a copy of the message should be kept in a machine journal on the originating computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#35](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#35)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#35](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#35)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseTracing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseTracing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示接收或查看消息时是否检索 属性信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to retrieve property information when receiving or peeking a message.

value.span: 如果接收 信息，则为 ；否则为 。
默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的类指定是否要向其目标队列移动跟踪的一条消息路由。The property of the class specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`，每次原始消息通过消息队列路由服务器，消息队列生成的报告消息发送到系统报告队列。If `true`, each time the original message passes through a Message Queuing routing server, a Message Queuing-generated report message is sent to the system report queue. 使用跟踪包括设置 Active Directory 和指定消息队列企业报告队列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 由管理员配置这些设置。These settings are configured by the administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[MessagePropertyFilter#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CPP/class1.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[MessagePropertyFilter#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagePropertyFilter/CS/class1.cs#36)]
